thread.title: Fidelity Moves Brian Hogan Out of Equity Division

author: Sarah Krouse
title: Fidelity Moves Brian Hogan Out of Equity Division
text:
The president of Fidelity Investments’ equity division is moving to a new role within the fund giant’s personal investing business later this quarter, leaving a post he has held since 2009.
Brian Hogan most recently led equity and high-income investing within the asset-management unit at Boston-based Fidelity. In his new role, he will be head of investment solutions and innovation within the company’s personal-investing unit, a Fidelity spokesman confirmed. The personal investing unit houses Fidelity’s brokerage platform,... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
